import React from 'react' function GraphOp(props) { const {gr,setGr,ch,st,type,setSt,setOp} = props const addVertex = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setOp("Vertex") } const addEdge = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let from = document.getElementById("input1").value let to = document.getElementById("input2").value let weight = document.getElementById("input3").value let dir = document.getElementById("directed").checked if(from === to) return // need to code when self loop const myStruc = (st.find(e => e.id === ch.id)) //my graph structure const edges = myStruc.edges const coor = myStruc.tile from = coor[from] from = from.join() to = coor[to] to = to.join() if(!from || !to )return //if faulty info is given edges.push([from,to,weight,dir]) const newSt = st.filter((e => e.id !== ch.id)).slice() //copy list of data structures without my graph const myNewSt = {...myStruc,edges:edges} newSt.push(myNewSt) setSt(newSt) } return (
) } export default GraphOp
